Text: Eating right is only one approach to protecting DNA replication in our bodies throughout the years, this is a good eBook, well worth reading if your into this kinda stuff.
It's called genetic "expression" and yes, diet affects it.  Read "genetic nutritioneering" by Jeffrey Bland for more info.  He's president of the Institute for Functional Medicine.
For skeptics, also consider how scientists have shown increased longevity corresponding to decreased caloric intake. The expression of SIR1 & SIR2 genes are part of this...
